title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Clicking on the first Combo does not give it focus. It only takes focus if the combo list is dropped down.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not gain focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: Clicking on the first Combo should give it focus, regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
